leve.name: And Then There Were None
leve.description: It begins as a dryness in the mouth, then a fever in the mind. The chill comes next: spreading through the ranks, shriveling resolve and making the most unreasoning fears condense into the lowest of actions. This is how we take the heart from the enemy. Amalj'aa scouts approachâ”€let them vanish, and terror take all those who wait.
